column4: The medium is not the grade of error, it means the storage medium is bad.
so the chip is toast, no way to recover it?
There might be special software around, but I have actually never had any luck recovering from damaged storage devices. There might be others in here who knows more about that.
alright, but so medium read error means that the chip is more than likely toast?
it means that there are errors on the medium.
Those errors might have come as a result of your phone crashing. The chip might still be ok if you format it. But I guess you are interrested in the content. :-)
